00035 const QByteArray DEFAULT_PAGE = "<html><body><h1>BRisa WebServer!</h1></body></html>";

00039 #include "brisawebserversession.h"

00041 BrisaWebserver::BrisaWebserver(const QHostAddress &host, quint16 port) :
00042         HttpServer(host, port)
00043 {
00044     addService("/", new BrisaWebStaticContent(DEFAULT_PAGE, this));
00045 }

00047 BrisaWebserver::~BrisaWebserver()
00048 {
00049 //    foreach (BrisaWebserverSession *session, listeners) {
00050 //        session->deleteLater();

00053 
00054 void BrisaWebserver::addService(QByteArray path, BrisaWebService *service)
00055 {
00056     if (!service || path.isEmpty())
00057         return;
00058 
00059     mutex.lock();
00060 
00061     if (!path.startsWith('/'))
00062         path.append('/');
00063 
00064     services[path] = service;
00065     service->m_path = path;
00066 
00067     mutex.unlock();
00068 }
00069 
00070 void BrisaWebserver::removeService(const QByteArray &path)
00071 {
00072     mutex.lock();
00073 
00074     if (services.contains(path)) {
00075         services[path]->m_path.clear();
00076         services.remove(path);
00077     }
00078 
00079     mutex.unlock();
00080 }
00081 
00082 BrisaWebService *BrisaWebserver::service(const QByteArray &path) const
00083 {
00084     mutex.lock();
00085     BrisaWebService *service = services.value(path);
00086     mutex.unlock();
00087     return service;
00088 }
00089 
00090 HttpSession *BrisaWebserver::incomingConnection(int socketDescriptor)
00091 {
00092     BrisaWebserverSession *session = new BrisaWebserverSession(socketDescriptor, this);
00093 
00094     mutex.lock();
00095 
00096     listeners.append(session);
00097 
00098     mutex.unlock();
00099 
00100     return session;
00101 }

00105 BrisaWebserver::BrisaWebserver(const QHostAddress &host, quint16 port) {
00106     QxtHttpSessionManager(this);
00107     rootService = new BrisaWebServiceProvider(this, this);
00108 
00109     this->setPort(port);
00110     this->setListenInterface(host);
00111     this->setConnector(HttpServer);
00112     this->setStaticContentService(rootService);
00113 }
00114 
00115 BrisaWebserver::~BrisaWebserver() {
00116     delete this->rootService;
00117 }
00118 
00119 int BrisaWebserver::newSession() {
00120     return QxtHttpSessionManager::newSession();
00121 }
00122 
00123 void BrisaWebserver::addService(QString path, QxtWebServiceDirectory *service) {
00124     this->rootService->addService(path, service);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void BrisaWebserver::incomingRequest(quint32 requestID,
00128         const QHttpRequestHeader &header, QxtWebContent *deviceContent) {
00129     QxtHttpSessionManager::incomingRequest(requestID, header, deviceContent);
00130     qDebug() << requestID << " Request";
00131     qDebug() << "Method: " << header.method();
00132     qDebug() << "URI: " << header.path();
00133 }
00134 
00135 void BrisaWebserver::publishFile(QString path, QString filePath) {
00136     // Publishing a file to the root
00137     this->rootService->addFile(path, filePath);
00138 }
